column1: An error occurred while clearing the Varnish cache.
column2: An error occurred while clearing the Varnish cache.

column1: Domain or IP list separted by semicolon (e.g. host1;127.0.0.1)
column2: Domain or IP list separted by semicolon (e.g. host1;127.0.0.1)

column1: If you see this message everything is fine.
column2: If you see this message everything is fine.

column1: Pass X-headers for debugging purpose to the client and log purge requests to /var/log/varnish_cache.log (ensure developer log is enabled).
column2: Pass X-headers for debugging purpose to the client and log purge requests to /var/log/varnish_cache.log (ensure developer log is enabled).

column1: Remove selected cache items in external Varnish cache.
column2: Remove selected cache items in external Varnish cache.

column1: Request variables that force setting of NO_CACHE cookie to permanent disable caching for visitor.
column2: Request variables that force setting of NO_CACHE cookie to permanent disable caching for visitor.

column1: Set "no-cache" HTTP header for certain routes/actions (e.g. checkout, catalog_product_view). Use one per line.
column2: Set "no-cache" HTTP header for certain routes/actions (e.g. checkout, catalog_product_view). Use one per line.

column1: Set a TTL of "0" for every request
column2: Set un TTL "0" pour toutes les applications

column1: TTL for cached pages in seconds for certain routes/actions (e.g. Route:"catalog_product_view", TTL:"7200").
column2: TTL for cached pages in seconds for certain routes/actions (e.g. Route:"catalog_product_view", TTL:"7200").

column1: The JavaScript/CSS cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.
column2: The JavaScript/CSS cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.

column1: The Varnish cache has been cleaned.
column2: The Varnish cache has been cleaned.

column1: The catalog image cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.
column2: The catalog image cache has been cleaned on the Varnish servers.

column2: Purger l'élément du cache categorie sur Enregistrer

column2: Purger l'élément du cache de produits sur Enregistrer
